theAya:SpeedUp.NAME: Speed Up
theAya:SpeedUp.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card from *Cloudstream *Sprint and *Wings *of *Ascend to add to your hand.
theAya:SpeedUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card from *Cloudstream *Sprint+ and *Wings *of *Ascend+ to add to your hand.

theAya:WingsOfAscend.NAME: Wings of Ascend
theAya:WingsOfAscend.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 theaya:Flight. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Gain 2 additional theaya:Flight. NL Exhaust.
theAya:WingsOfAscend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 theaya:Flight. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Gain 2 additional theaya:Flight. NL Exhaust.

theAya:CloudstreamSprint.NAME: Cloudstream Sprint
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Draw 1 additional card. NL Exhaust.
theAya:CloudstreamSprint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Draw 1 additional card. NL Exhaust.

theAya:SpinStrike.NAME: Spin Strike
theAya:SpinStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this card is drawn, its damage increases by !M! for this combat.

theAya:MapleDance.NAME: Maple Dance
theAya:MapleDance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theAya:CardWindSpeed! theaya:Wind_Speed. NL Whenever this card is drawn, gain an additional !M! theaya:Wind_Speed for this combat.

theAya:SwiftWindFan.NAME: Swift Wind Fan
theAya:SwiftWindFan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theaya:Wind !M!: One more attack.

theAya:TenguSpirit.NAME: Tengu Spirit
theAya:TenguSpirit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] NL and 50 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:GaleAssault.NAME: Gale Assault
theAya:GaleAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theaya:Wind !M! , theaya:Continuous: gain 1 Strength, at the end of this turn, lose it.

theAya:Landing.NAME: Landing
theAya:Landing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust. NL theaya:Aerial , theaya:Landing.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must have at least 1 Flight to use this card.

theAya:WindborneGlide.NAME: Wind-borne Glide
theAya:WindborneGlide.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 theaya:Flight and 15 theaya:Wind_Speed. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1 this combat.
theAya:WindborneGlide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Innate. NL Gain 1 theaya:Flight and 15 theaya:Wind_Speed. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1 this combat.

theAya:Instamatic.NAME: Instamatic
theAya:Instamatic.DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 theaya:Snapshot of it. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
theAya:Instamatic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 theaya:Snapshot of it. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 snapshot of it.

theAya:TempestWrath.NAME: Tempest's Wrath
theAya:TempestWrath.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are in [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Warfare[] , gain 1 Strength.

theAya:GentleBreeze.NAME: Gentle Breeze
theAya:GentleBreeze.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are in [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Healing[] , gain 5 Temporary HP.

theAya:NocturnalTempest.NAME: Nocturnal Tempest
theAya:NocturnalTempest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 theaya:Tremble. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Apply 1 more theaya:Tremble.

theAya:WindBlade.NAME: Wind Blade
theAya:WindBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Deal !D! additional damage.

theAya:Accelerator.NAME: Accelerator
theAya:Accelerator.DESCRIPTION: Double your current theaya:Wind_Speed. NL Exhaust.

theAya:AirplaneMode.NAME: Airplane Mode
theAya:AirplaneMode.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 4 theaya:Flight.

theAya:Dive.NAME: Dive
theAya:Dive.DESCRIPTION: For each point of theaya:Flight you have, deal !D! damage. NL theaya:Aerial , theaya:Landing.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must have at least 1 Flight to use this card.

theAya:WindSurge.NAME: Wind Surge
theAya:WindSurge.DESCRIPTION: theaya:Wind !M!: Gain [E] [E] next turn. NL theaya:Aerial.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must have at least 1 Flight to use this card.

theAya:Flow.NAME: Flow
theAya:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, NL discard !M! cards. NL theaya:Wind 10: Draw 1 more card after this.

theAya:Advertisement.NAME: Advertisement
theAya:Advertisement.DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 theaya:Snapshot of it, its cost is increased by 2, NL repeat X times. NL theaya:Wind 100: Snapshot does not have additional cost.
theAya:Advertisement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 theaya:Snapshot of it, its cost is increased by 2, NL repeat X+1 times. NL theaya:Wind 100: Snapshot does not have additional cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 snapshot of it.

theAya:Industrialization.NAME: Industrialization
theAya:Industrialization.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all theaya:Snapshot cards in your hand by X.
theAya:Industrialization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all theaya:Snapshot cards in your hand by X+1.

theAya:TenguDailyReport.NAME: Tengu Daily Report
theAya:TenguDailyReport.DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 2 theaya:Snapshot of it, its cost is increased by 1. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Snapshot does not have additional cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 snapshot of it.

theAya:CatapultLaunch.NAME: Catapult Launch
theAya:CatapultLaunch.DESCRIPTION: If you do not have theaya:Flight, gain 5 Flight and 30 theaya:Wind_Speed, otherwise gain 1 Flight.

theAya:TemporaryTruce.NAME: Temporary Truce
theAya:TemporaryTruce.DESCRIPTION: Lose half of your theaya:Wind_Speed, NL you will not gain theaya:Wind_Speed this turn, NL next turn, gain back 2 times the lost theaya:Wind_Speed.
theAya:TemporaryTruce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose half of your theaya:Wind_Speed, NL you will not gain theaya:Wind_Speed this turn, NL next turn, gain back 3 times the lost theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:FieryCombo.NAME: Fiery Combo
theAya:FieryCombo.DESCRIPTION: If you are in [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Warfare[] this turn, gain 1 Strength for each card played. NL theaya:Wind 20: Enter The Wind of Warfare first.

theAya:WindShield.NAME: Wind Shield
theAya:WindShield.DESCRIPTION: If you are in [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Resistance[] this turn, gain 20 Block. NL theaya:Wind 10: Retain the Block to next turn.

theAya:Heal.NAME: Heal
theAya:Heal.DESCRIPTION: If you are in [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Healing[] this turn, convert Temporary HP to HP. NL theaya:Wind 10: Enter The Wind of Healing first.

theAya:WindGodGirl.NAME: Wind God Girl
theAya:WindGodGirl.DESCRIPTION: If you are in [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Soaring[] this turn, multiply theaya:Wind_Speed by !M!. NL theaya:Wind 20: Enter The Wind of Soaring first. NL Exhaust.

theAya:TurbulentLand.NAME: Turbulent Land
theAya:TurbulentLand.DESCRIPTION: Enter a random Wind, NL theaya:Wind 10: Gain 20 theaya:Wind_Speed.
theAya:TurbulentLand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter a random Wind, NL Gain 20 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:OffensiveStance.NAME: Offensive Stance
theAya:OffensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Warfare[], NL gain 3 Temporary Strength, NL gain 10 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:ShiftingTengu.NAME: Shifting Tengu
theAya:ShiftingTengu.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 theaya:Wind_Speed each time you switch Wind.

theAya:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
theAya:DefensiveStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Resistance[], NL gain 10 Block, NL gain 10 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:Convection.NAME: Convection
theAya:Convection.DESCRIPTION: Deal 3 damage to all enemies each time you gain 30 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:WindCut.NAME: Wind Cut
theAya:WindCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL theaya:Wind 15: Attack 1 more time. NL theaya:Wind 30: Attack 2 more times.

theAya:TenguCombo.NAME: Tengu Combo
theAya:TenguCombo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage, gain 5 theaya:Wind_Speed, whenever you switch Wind, put this card back to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must have at least 1 Flight to use this card.

theAya:WindlessWeather.NAME: Windless Weather
theAya:WindlessWeather.DESCRIPTION: Lose all theaya:Wind_Speed and theaya:Flight, gain !M! Intangible, Exhaust. NL theaya:Wind 100: Do not Exhaust.

theAya:Printer.NAME: Printer
theAya:Printer.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, select 1 card in your hand and generate 1 theaya:Snapshot of it, its cost is increased by 1.

theAya:WindTurbine.NAME: Wind Turbine
theAya:WindTurbine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce 20 theaya:Wind_Speed, gain [E].

theAya:CommonCold.NAME: Common Cold
theAya:CommonCold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply 3 Poison. NL theaya:Wind !M!: Apply 2 more Poison NL theaya:Wind !M!: Apply 1 more theaya:Tremble.

theAya:StartlingTeleport.NAME: Startling Teleport
theAya:StartlingTeleport.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 theaya:Tremble. NL theaya:Wind 10: Apply 1 more theaya:Tremble.

theAya:SwiftRunning.NAME: Swift Running
theAya:SwiftRunning.DESCRIPTION: Gain 50 theaya:Wind_Speed. NL theaya:Wind 100: Apply 2 theaya:Tremble to all enemies. NL theaya:Aerial.
theAya:SwiftRunning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 70 theaya:Wind_Speed, NL theaya:Wind 100: Apply 2 theaya:Tremble to all enemies. NL theaya:Aerial.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must have at least 1 Flight to use this card.

theAya:HighSpeedPhoto.NAME: High Speed Photo
theAya:HighSpeedPhoto.DESCRIPTION: Generate 1 theaya:Snapshot of a random card in your hand.

theAya:FullSpeedImpact.NAME: Full Speed Impact
theAya:FullSpeedImpact.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theaya:Wind !M! , theaya:Continuous: NL Attack again NL and deal 1.05x damage.

theAya:HealingStance.NAME: Healing Stance
theAya:HealingStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Healing[], NL gain 5 Temporary HP, NL gain 10 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:SoaringStance.NAME: Soaring Stance
theAya:SoaringStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter [#EFC851]The [#EFC851]Wind [#EFC851]of [#EFC851]Soaring[], NL gain 2 theaya:Flight, NL gain 10 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:LockOnTarget.NAME: Lock On Target
theAya:LockOnTarget.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, NL apply 1 theaya:Tengu_Mark and 1 theaya:Black_Feather to a random enemy.

theAya:DexterousTengu.NAME: Dexterous Tengu
theAya:DexterousTengu.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL theaya:Wind 10: Draw 1 more card.

theAya:BouncingAya.NAME: Bouncing Aya
theAya:BouncingAya.DESCRIPTION: Each time theaya:Wind_Speed is reduced to 0, NL gain 15 theaya:Wind_Speed and 1 theaya:Flight, NL up to 10 times per turn.

theAya:SofteningClutchClaw.NAME: Softening Clutch Claw
theAya:SofteningClutchClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL and apply !M! Weakness. NL theaya:Aerial.

theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.NAME: Maple Leaf Waltz
theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! theaya:Wind_Speed X times.
theAya:MapleLeafWaltz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! theaya:Wind_Speed X+1 times.

theAya:YatagarasuWhirlwind.NAME: Yatagarasu Whirlwind
theAya:YatagarasuWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, NL if the enemy is killed, NL deal 5 more damage for the rest of this combat. NL theaya:Aerial.

theAya:FanningAssault.NAME: Fanning Assault
theAya:FanningAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For every 50 theaya:Wind_Speed, NL deal 1x more damage. NL theaya:Wind !M! : NL Attack again.

theAya:BlackFeathers.NAME: Black Feathers
theAya:BlackFeathers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and apply 1 theaya:Black_Feather.

theAya:BirdGateWhirlwind.NAME: Bird Gate Whirlwind
theAya:BirdGateWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL theaya:Wind !M! : Apply 1 theaya:Black_Feather. NL theaya:Aerial.

theAya:ViolentNewsHarvesting.NAME: Violent News Harvesting
theAya:ViolentNewsHarvesting.DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 damage, NL theaya:Wind !M! : NL If there is an attack card in your hand, NL randomly select 1, NL and play its theaya:Snapshot.

theAya:TenguAmulet.NAME: Tengu Amulet
theAya:TenguAmulet.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain 20 theaya:Wind_Speed and 2 theaya:Flight.
theAya:TenguAmulet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain 30 theaya:Wind_Speed and 3 theaya:Flight.

theAya:TenguGaleBullet.NAME: Tengu Gale Bullet
theAya:TenguGaleBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If in theaya:Offensive_Stance, NL deal 3x damage. NL theaya:Wind !M! : NL Enter Offensive_Stance first.

theAya:DanceOfWings.NAME: Dance Of Wings
theAya:DanceOfWings.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For every theaya:Flight you have, NL deal !M! more damage. NL theaya:Aerial.

theAya:MapleGale.NAME: Maple Gale
theAya:MapleGale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply 1 theaya:Tengu_Mark each time.

theAya:FanDanceStorm.NAME: Fan Dance Storm
theAya:FanDanceStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 damage, NL gain 10 theaya:Wind_Speed and 1 theaya:Flight. NL theaya:Aerial.
theAya:FanDanceStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 damage, NL gain 15 theaya:Wind_Speed and 2 theaya:Flight. NL theaya:Aerial.

theAya:NewsBlitz.NAME: News Blitz
theAya:NewsBlitz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Randomly gain 1 theaya:Snapshot of a card in your hand. NL theaya:Aerial.
theAya:NewsBlitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Randomly gain 1 theaya:Snapshot of a card in your hand.

theAya:CeaselessShutter.NAME: Ceaseless Shutter
theAya:CeaselessShutter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theaya:Wind !M! , theaya:Continuous: NL If there is an attack card in your hand, NL randomly select 1, NL and play its theaya:Snapshot.

theAya:NewspaperUpgrade.NAME: Newspaper Upgrade
theAya:NewspaperUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of theaya:Snapshot cards by 1.

theAya:UnknownMaru.NAME: ?? Maru
theAya:UnknownMaru.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 theaya:Tremble to a random enemy.

theAya:Updraft.NAME: Updraft
theAya:Updraft.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, NL gain 1 theaya:Flight for every 30 theaya:Wind_Speed.

theAya:FastestInGensokyo.NAME: Fastest In Gensokyo
theAya:FastestInGensokyo.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, NL gain 10 theaya:Wind_Speed for every 1 theaya:Flight.
